title: Successful login with valid email and password
description: Verify that a user can log into the Beep Manager platform successfully with correct email and password credentials and that a session is maintained.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid registered email address
Enter the correct password
Click the login button
Verify the user is routed to the Home Dashboard
Verify an active session is established and maintained

title: Login fails with incorrect password
description: Verify that the login attempt fails when the correct email is entered but an incorrect password is provided, and the user is notified accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid registered email address
Enter an incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
Verify the user remains on the login page

title: Dashboard menu navigation
description: Verify that each menu item on the Home Dashboard correctly routes the user to the respective module (Messenger, Calendar, Handover, Checklist, Attendance, Settings) without delay or errors.

steps.description: Login successfully and land on Home Dashboard
Click on the Messenger menu item
Verify navigation to Messenger module
Navigate back to Home Dashboard
Click on the Calendar menu item
Verify navigation to Calendar module
Navigate back to Home Dashboard
Click on the Handover menu item
Verify navigation to Handover module
Navigate back to Home Dashboard
Click on the Checklist menu item
Verify navigation to Checklist module
Navigate back to Home Dashboard
Click on the Attendance menu item
Verify navigation to Attendance module
Navigate back to Home Dashboard
Click on the Settings menu item
Verify navigation to Settings module

title: Attendance clock-in with valid GPS location
description: Verify that a user can successfully clock-in at the store location when GPS verification confirms presence, and that status and UI update in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to Attendance module
Ensure GPS location is enabled and matching store coordinates
Click the clock-in button
Verify clock-in is successful
Verify the attendance status updates in real-time on UI
Verify location verification success message or indication is shown

title: Attendance clock-in with valid Wi-Fi verification
description: Verify that user presence is verified correctly via Wi-Fi connection and they can successfully clock-in with the attendance status updated accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Attendance module
Connect device to approved store Wi-Fi network
Click the clock-in button
Verify clock-in completes successfully
Verify the attendance status and UI update in real-time

title: Attendance clock-in failure due to location mismatch
description: Verify that if GPS or Wi-Fi verification fails (user not at store location), clock-in is not allowed and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to Attendance module
Ensure GPS location does not match store location and device is not connected to store Wi-Fi
Attempt to click the clock-in button
Verify clock-in action is blocked
Verify error message indicating location verification failure is shown

title: Real-time message sync across multiple devices
description: Verify that messages sent in a chat channel are synchronized instantly and consistently across multiple logged-in devices for the same user and other users in the channel.

steps.description: Login to Messenger module on Device A and Device B with same user account
Join or open a shared chat channel on both devices
Send a text message from Device A
Verify the message appears on Device B instantly
Send a text message from Device B
Verify the message appears on Device A instantly

title: Calendar monthly view displays events correctly
description: Verify that the Calendar module properly displays all scheduled events in the monthly view with correct dates and formatting.

steps.description: Navigate to the Calendar module
Verify the monthly calendar view loads without errors
Verify predefined or existing events are displayed on correct dates
Verify event summaries or titles appear legibly within the calendar day cells

title: Add and edit calendar events with real-time update
description: Verify that users can create new events and edit existing events in the calendar with changes synchronized immediately across sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to Calendar module
Add a new event with title, date, and time
Verify the new event appears instantly in the calendar view
Edit the newly created event's details
Verify the edits are reflected immediately in the calendar
Verify the changes are synchronized in real-time on another logged-in device or session

title: Handover notes are saved and shared correctly
description: Verify that daily operational notes entered in the Handover module are saved persistently and can be retrieved and viewed by other relevant users.

steps.description: Navigate to Handover module
Create and save daily operational notes with various content
Verify notes are saved without errors
Login with a different user account having access
Navigate to Handover module
Verify the previously saved notes are viewable and content is accurate

title: Checklist task completion and reset between shifts
description: Verify that checklist tasks in opening and closing shifts reflect accurate completion states and that the checklist resets appropriately for new shifts.

steps.description: Navigate to Checklist module during opening shift
Mark a subset of tasks as completed
Verify task completion states are saved and displayed correctly
Complete remaining tasks and save
Simulate transition to closing shift
Verify checklist resets to initial state or according to closing shift requirements

title: Profile and Store Settings update persistence
description: Verify that changes to user profile information and store-specific settings persist correctly and influence app behavior as intended.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile Settings
Modify user profile fields (e.g., name, contact info)
Save changes
Verify changes are persisted and displayed after reload
Navigate to Store Settings
Update store-specific preferences (e.g., store hours, location info)
Save changes
Verify settings are persisted and effective within app

title: UI adherence to design standards
description: Verify that the UI across all modules adheres to the specified design principles including glassmorphism effects, gradients, use of 3D icons, responsive layouts, and consistent light/dark mode themes.

steps.description: Navigate through all main modules (Dashboard, Attendance, Messenger, Calendar, etc.)
Verify glassmorphism visual effects are applied as specified
Verify 3D-styled icons appear on dashboard menu items
Verify gradients are used correctly per design guidelines
Test UI responsiveness on different screen sizes and orientations
Switch between light and dark modes
Verify UI maintains consistency and adheres to design in both modes

title: Navigation flow integrity with custom router
description: Verify that navigation using the custom router maintains correct state, preserves history, and prevents errors or inconsistent views during view transitions.

steps.description: From Home Dashboard, navigate to Attendance module
From Attendance, navigate to Calendar module
Navigate back to Home Dashboard using router functionality
Verify UI displays the expected view at each navigation step without errors
Use router history to navigate backward and forward between views
Verify navigation history behaves as expected, without stale or broken views
Attempt rapid sequential navigations between modules
Verify application maintains stable state and no crashes or glitches occur
